item.title: Attention Is Not All You Need. It's How You Need It.
item.description:
In 2017, the paper Attention Is All You Need launched a revolution…

Exaaampleeee

item.title: Attention Is Not All You Need. It's How You Need It.
About Me
item.description:
I’m someone who’s curious about astrophysics, tech and highly interested in social justice and climate change.

This portfolio mostly consists of my techie side, with a hint of other stuff as well in an (as you’ve already figured out) extremely informal tone.

I’m currently working as an FPGA Developer, exploring various ways and applications of reconfigurable edge ML acceleration.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: You can contact me via Email or LinkedIn. I usually respond within a few hours. I can’t guarantee about insta DMs tho :)

item.title: Experience
item.description:
Considering my heavy curiosity towards Tech, Mathematics and my sheer passion for Astrophysics since childhood, I’ve tilted my career towards RTL Design. I’ve tinkered with everything I could find during my undergrad (Linux, android application Reverse engineering, RTL Design, Computer Architectures, pure mathematics), and my list of ‘Stuff that I love to to’ only grew as I explored more.

Sophomore me and a few of my seniors formed the University’s Entrepreneurship-Cell, to stir up some startup culture on campus, and the journey got helped us meet many, MANY professionals, gave us invites from IITB’s E-Summit and Startup Mahakumbh 2024 in Delhi. I have moderated a couple of Panel Discussions in Development Dialogue myself, organised by Kakatiya Sandbox’s, and a few more in my college events.
